1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 # Lib
3 
4 from niryo_robot_utils import NiryoRosWrapperException, NiryoActionClient, NiryoTopicValue, AbstractNiryoRosWrapper
5 
6 # Command Status
7 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus, SoftwareVersion
8 
9 # Messages
10 from geometry_msgs.msg import Point
11 from std_msgs.msg import Bool, Int32
12 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import RPY
13 from niryo_robot_tools_commander.msg import ToolCommand, TCP
14 
15 # Services
16 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import SetBool, SetInt, Trigger
17 
18 # Actions
19 from niryo_robot_tools_commander.msg import ToolGoal, ToolAction
20 
21 # Enums
22 from .tools_ros_wrapper_enums import ToolID
23 
24 
25 class ToolsRosWrapper(AbstractNiryoRosWrapper):
26 
27  def __init__(self, service_timeout=0.2):
28  super(ToolsRosWrapper, self).__init__(service_timeout)
29 
30  # -- Subscribers
31  self.__current_tool_id_ntv = NiryoTopicValue('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/current_id', Int32)
32  self.__tcp_ntv = NiryoTopicValue('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/tcp', TCP)
33 
34  # -- Tool action
35  self.__tool_action_nac = NiryoActionClient('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/action_server', ToolAction, ToolGoal)
36 
37  def get_current_tool_id(self):
38  """
39  Uses /niryo_robot_tools_commander/current_id topic to get current tool id
40 
41  :return: Tool Id
42  :rtype: ToolID
43  """
44  return self.__current_tool_id_ntv.value.data
45 
46  def update_tool(self):
47  """
48  Calls service niryo_robot_tools_commander/update_tool to update tool
49 
50  :return: status, message
51  :rtype: (int, str)
52  """
53  result = self._call_service('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/update_tool', Trigger)
54  return self._classic_return_w_check(result)
55 
56  def grasp_with_tool(self, pin_id=""):
57  """
58  Grasps with the tool linked to tool_id.
59  This action corresponds to
60  - Close gripper for Grippers
61  - Pull Air for Vacuum pump
62  - Activate for Electromagnet
63 
64  :param pin_id: [Only required for electromagnet] Pin ID of the electromagnet
65  :type pin_id: PinID
66  :return: status, message
67  :rtype: (int, str)
68  """
69  tool_id = self.get_current_tool_id()
70 
71  if tool_id in (ToolID.GRIPPER_1, ToolID.GRIPPER_2, ToolID.GRIPPER_3, ToolID.GRIPPER_4):
72  return self.close_gripper()
73  elif tool_id in (ToolID.VACUUM_PUMP_1, ToolID.VACUUM_PUMP_2):
74  return self.pull_air_vacuum_pump()
75  elif tool_id == ToolID.ELECTROMAGNET_1:
76  return self.activate_electromagnet(pin_id)
77 
78  def release_with_tool(self, pin_id=""):
79  """
80  Releases with the tool associated to tool_id.
81  This action corresponds to
82  - Open gripper for Grippers
83  - Push Air for Vacuum pump
84  - Deactivate for Electromagnet
85 
86  :param pin_id: [Only required for electromagnet] Pin ID of the electromagnet
87  :type pin_id: PinID
88  :return: status, message
89  :rtype: (int, str)
90  """
91  tool_id = self.get_current_tool_id()
92 
93  if tool_id in (ToolID.GRIPPER_1, ToolID.GRIPPER_2, ToolID.GRIPPER_3, ToolID.GRIPPER_4):
94  return self.open_gripper()
95  elif tool_id in (ToolID.VACUUM_PUMP_1, ToolID.VACUUM_PUMP_2):
96  return self.push_air_vacuum_pump()
97  elif tool_id == ToolID.ELECTROMAGNET_1:
98  return self.deactivate_electromagnet(pin_id)
99 
100  # - Gripper
101  def open_gripper(self, speed=500, max_torque_percentage=100, hold_torque_percentage=20):
102  """
103  Opens gripper with a speed 'speed'
104 
105  :param speed: Default -> 500
106  :type speed: int
107  :param max_torque_percentage: Default -> 100
108  :type max_torque_percentage: int
109  :param hold_torque_percentage: Default -> 20
110  :type hold_torque_percentage: int
111  :return: status, message
112  :rtype: (int, str)
113  """
114  return self.__deal_with_gripper(ToolCommand.OPEN_GRIPPER, speed, max_torque_percentage, hold_torque_percentage)
115 
116  def close_gripper(self, speed=500, max_torque_percentage=100, hold_torque_percentage=50):
117  """
118  Closes gripper with a speed 'speed'
119 
120  :param speed: Default -> 500
121  :type speed: int
122  :param max_torque_percentage: Default -> 100
123  :type max_torque_percentage: int
124  :param hold_torque_percentage: Default -> 20
125  :type hold_torque_percentage: int
126  :return: status, message
127  :rtype: (int, str)
128  """
129  return self.__deal_with_gripper(ToolCommand.CLOSE_GRIPPER, speed, max_torque_percentage, hold_torque_percentage)
130 
131  def __deal_with_gripper(self, command_int, speed=500, max_torque_percentage=100, hold_torque_percentage=100):
132  goal = ToolGoal()
133  goal.cmd.tool_id = self.get_current_tool_id()
134  goal.cmd.cmd_type = command_int
135  goal.cmd.max_torque_percentage = max_torque_percentage
136  goal.cmd.hold_torque_percentage = hold_torque_percentage
137  if command_int == ToolCommand.OPEN_GRIPPER:
138  goal.cmd.speed = speed
139  else:
140  goal.cmd.speed = speed
141  return self.__tool_action_nac.execute(goal)
142 
143  # - Vacuum
144  def pull_air_vacuum_pump(self):
145  """
146  Pulls air
147 
148  :return: status, message
149  :rtype: (int, str)
150  """
151  return self.__deal_with_vacuum_pump(ToolCommand.PULL_AIR_VACUUM_PUMP)
152 
153  def push_air_vacuum_pump(self):
154  """
155  Pulls air
156 
157  :return: status, message
158  :rtype: (int, str)
159  """
160  return self.__deal_with_vacuum_pump(ToolCommand.PUSH_AIR_VACUUM_PUMP)
161 
162  def __deal_with_vacuum_pump(self, command_int):
163  goal = ToolGoal()
164  goal.cmd.tool_id = self.get_current_tool_id()
165  goal.cmd.cmd_type = command_int
166 
167  return self.__tool_action_nac.execute(goal)
168 
169  # - Electromagnet
170  def setup_electromagnet(self, pin_id):
171  """
172  Setups electromagnet on pin
173 
174  :param pin_id: Pin ID
175  :type pin_id: PinID
176  :return: status, message
177  :rtype: (int, str)
178  """
179  result = self._call_service('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/equip_electromagnet', SetInt, ToolID.ELECTROMAGNET_1)
180 
181  if result.status != CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
182  return result.status, result.message
183 
184  return self.__deal_with_electromagnet(pin_id, ToolCommand.SETUP_DIGITAL_IO)
185 
186  def activate_electromagnet(self, pin_id):
187  """
188  Activates electromagnet associated to electromagnet_id on pin_id
189 
190  :param pin_id: Pin ID
191  :type pin_id: PinID
192  :return: status, message
193  :rtype: (int, str)
194  """
195  return self.__deal_with_electromagnet(pin_id, ToolCommand.ACTIVATE_DIGITAL_IO)
196 
197  def deactivate_electromagnet(self, pin_id):
198  """
199  Deactivates electromagnet associated to electromagnet_id on pin_id
200 
201  :param pin_id: Pin ID
202  :type pin_id: PinID
203  :return: status, message
204  :rtype: (int, str)
205  """
206  return self.__deal_with_electromagnet(pin_id, ToolCommand.DEACTIVATE_DIGITAL_IO)
207 
208  def __deal_with_electromagnet(self, pin_id, command_int):
209  goal = ToolGoal()
210  goal.cmd.tool_id = ToolID.ELECTROMAGNET_1
211  goal.cmd.cmd_type = command_int
212  goal.cmd.gpio = pin_id
213  return self.__tool_action_nac.execute(goal)
214 
215  # - TCP
216  def enable_tcp(self, enable=True):
217  """
218  Enables or disables the TCP function (Tool Center Point).
219  If activation is requested, the last recorded TCP value will be applied.
220  The default value depends on the gripper equipped.
221  If deactivation is requested, the TCP will be coincident with the tool_link.
222 
223  :param enable: True to enable, False otherwise.
224  :type enable: bool
225  :return: status, message
226  :rtype: (int, str)
227  """
228  result = self._call_service('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/enable_tcp', SetBool, enable)
229  return self._classic_return_w_check(result)
230 
231  def get_tcp(self):
232  """
233  Returns the TCP state
234  :return: the tcp (enabled, position and orientation)
235  :rtype: Tool msg object
236  """
237  return self.__tcp_ntv.value
238 
239  def set_tcp(self, x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw):
240  """
241  Activates the TCP function (Tool Center Point)
242  and defines the transformation between the tool_link frame and the TCP frame.
243 
244  :param x:
245  :type x: float
246  :param y:
247  :type y: float
248  :param z:
249  :type z: float
250  :param roll:
251  :type roll: float
252  :param pitch:
253  :type pitch: float
254  :param yaw:
255  :type yaw: float
256  :return: status, message
257  :rtype: (int, str)
258  """
259  from niryo_robot_tools_commander.srv import SetTCP, SetTCPRequest
260  req = SetTCPRequest(position=Point(x, y, z), rpy=RPY(roll, pitch, yaw))
261  result = self._call_service('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/set_tcp', SetTCP, req)
262  return self._classic_return_w_check(result)
263 
264  def reset_tcp(self):
265  """
266  Resets the TCP (Tool Center Point) transformation.
267  The TCP will be reset according to the tool equipped.
268 
269  :return: status, message
270  :rtype: (int, str)
271  """
272  result = self._call_service('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/reset_tcp', Trigger)
273  return self._classic_return_w_check(result)
274 
275  def tool_reboot(self):
276  """
277  Reboots the motor of the tool equipped. Useful when an Overload error occurs. (cf HardwareStatus)
278 
279  :return: status, message
280  :rtype: (int, str)
281  """
282  result = self._call_service('/niryo_robot/tools/reboot', Trigger)
283  return self._classic_return_w_check(result)
